content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: AGE
      operator: non_empty
    - name: AGEU
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000189
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when AGE is not blank and AGEU is blank.
Outcome:
  Message: AGEU is missing when AGE is provided.
  Output Variables:
    - AGE
    - AGEU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0665
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: '[AGEU]Variable Qualifier of AGE or AGETXT.|[AGETXT]Not
                  in human clinical trials.'
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: AGEU|AGETXT
                Section: Demographics
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when AGE is not blank and AGEU is blank.

Outcome.Message: AGEU is missing when AGE is provided.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: [AGEU]Variable Qualifier of AGE or AGETXT.|[AGETXT]Not in human clinical trials.
